name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, crispy pancetta, eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs and grated cheese together.
Toss cooked spaghetti with pancetta.
Add egg mixture to spaghetti and pancetta, stirring constantly.
Serve immediately.

name: Sushi
description: A Japanese delicacy featuring vinegared rice, fresh fish, and various toppings, rolled in seaweed and sliced into bite-sized pieces.
steps: Prepare sushi rice according to instructions.
Slice fish and other ingredients into thin strips.
Lay nori sheet on bamboo mat.
Spread rice on nori, add ingredients, and roll tightly.
Slice sushi into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: A Mexican street food favorite consisting of marinated pork, grilled and sliced thinly, served on tortillas with pineapple, onion, and cilantro.
steps: Marinate pork shoulder slices.
Skewer and cook pork until crispy.
Slice cooked pork thinly.
Serve on warm tortillas with pineapple, onion, cilantro, and salsa.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, eggs, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy sauce.
steps: Soak rice noodles until softened.
Stir-fry with protein, eggs, tofu, and peanuts.
Add bean sprouts and sauce.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A flavorful Indian curry dish featuring marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce, served with rice or naan bread.
steps: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onion, garlic, and spices.
Add tomato sauce and cream, simmer.
Add cooked chicken to sauce, simmer until flavors meld.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Hamburger
description: A classic American dish featuring a grilled beef patty served on a toasted bun with various toppings.
steps: Form ground beef into patties.
Grill or fry patties until cooked to desired doneness.
Toast hamburger buns.
Assemble burgers with desired toppings like lettuce, tomato, onion, cheese, and condiments.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese, tossed in a creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Grill chicken breasts until fully cooked.
Tear romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Combine lettuce, sliced chicken, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese in a large bowl.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to coat evenly.
Serve immediately.

name: Miso Soup
description: A traditional Japanese soup consisting of dashi stock, tofu, seaweed, and miso paste, garnished with sliced green onions.
steps: Bring dashi stock to a simmer.
Add cubed tofu and sliced seaweed to the simmering stock.
Scoop out some of the hot broth and dissolve miso paste into it, then return the mixture to the pot.
Simmer for a few more minutes, then remove from heat.
Garnish with sliced green onions and serve hot.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A Russian dish made with sautéed beef strips, onions, mushrooms, and sour cream, served over egg noodles.
steps: Sauté thinly sliced beef until browned, then remove from skillet.
Sauté sliced onions and mushrooms in the same skillet.
Return beef to skillet, add beef broth and simmer.
Stir in sour cream and season with salt and pepper.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic glaze.
steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese into thick slices.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating them.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the tomato and mozzarella slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve immediately.
